patthana1.1:6.1: Hetupaccayo, ārammaṇapaccayo, adhipatipaccayo, anantarapaccayo, samanantarapaccayo, sahajātapaccayo, aññamaññapaccayo, nissayapaccayo, upanissayapaccayo, purejātapaccayo, pacchājātapaccayo, āsevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipākapaccayo, āhārapaccayo, indriyapaccayo, jhānapaccayo, maggapaccayo, sampayuttapaccayo, vippayuttapaccayo, atthipaccayo, natthipaccayo, vigatapaccayo, avigatapaccayoti.
patthana1.1:9.2: hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.1:10.2: rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.3: Saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.4: Gandhāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.5: Rasāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.6: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.7: Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.8: Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:11.1: Yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.1:12.2: chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:12.3: Vīriyādhipati vīriyasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:12.4: Cittādhipati cittasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:12.5: Vīmaṃsādhipati vīmaṃsasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:13.1: Yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.1:14.2: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:14.3: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:15.1: Sotaviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:15.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:16.1: Ghānaviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:16.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:17.1: Jivhāviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:17.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:18.1: Kāyaviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:18.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:19.1: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:19.2: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:20.1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:20.2: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:21.1: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:21.2: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:21.3: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:22.1: Yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.1:23.2: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:23.3: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:24.1: Sotaviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:24.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:25.1: Ghānaviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:25.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:26.1: Jivhāviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:26.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:27.1: Kāyaviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:27.2: Manodhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:28.1: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:28.2: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:29.1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:29.2: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.2: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.3: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:31.1: Yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarapaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana1.1:32.2: cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:32.5: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:32.7: Rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kiñci kālesahajātapaccayena paccayo, kiñci kāle na sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #6
patthana1.1:34.2: cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:34.5: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.2: Sotāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.3: Ghānāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.4: Jivhāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.5: Kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.6: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo. #8
patthana1.1:36.2: purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.3: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ kesañci upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.4: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:37.1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:37.2: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ kesañci upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:37.3: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:38.1: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:38.2: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:38.3: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.2: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.3: Sotāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.4: Ghānāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.5: Jivhāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.6: Kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.1: Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.2: Saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.3: Gandhāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.4: Rasāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.5: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.6: Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:42.1: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:42.2: Manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ kiñci kāle purejātapaccayena paccayo, kiñci kāle na purejātapaccayena paccayo. #10
patthana1.1:43.2: pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #11
patthana1.1:44.2: purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:44.3: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:44.4: Purimā purimā kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #12
patthana1.1:45.2: kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:45.3: Cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #13
patthana1.1:46.2: vipākā cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo. #14
patthana1.1:47.3: Arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. #15
patthana1.1:48.2: cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:48.3: Sotindriyaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:48.4: Ghānindriyaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:48.5: Jivhindriyaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:48.6: Kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:49.1: Arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. #16
patthana1.1:50.2: jhānaṅgāni jhānasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo. #17
patthana1.1:51.2: maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. #18
patthana1.1:52.2: cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ sampayuttapaccayena paccayo. #19
patthana1.1:53.2: rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:53.3: Arūpino dhammā rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #20
patthana1.1:54.2: cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:54.5: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.2: Sotāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.3: Ghānāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.4: Jivhāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.5: Kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.1: Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.2: Saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.3: Gandhāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.4: Rasāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.5: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.6: Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #21
patthana1.1:58.2: samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ natthipaccayena paccayo. #22
patthana1.1:59.2: samanantaravigatā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ vigatapaccayena paccayo. #23
patthana1.1:60.2: cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:60.5: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:61.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:61.2: Sotāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:61.3: Ghānāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:61.4: Jivhāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:61.5: Kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:62.1: Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:62.2: Saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:62.3: Gandhāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:62.4: Rasāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:62.5: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:62.6: Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:63.1: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ avigatapaccayena paccayo. #24

patthana1.1:83.1: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:84.1: (Yathā hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayopi vitthāretabbo vācanāmaggena.)

patthana1.1:109.1: (Yathā anulome hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṃ paccanīyepi nahetupaccayo vitthāretabbo.)

patthana1.1:122.1: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.1:125.1: Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā … pe …
